linux-x64.note: Official binaries require GLIBC 2.38+; build from source for Ubuntu 20.04+ compatibility

notes.license: Public Domain - SQLite is released into the public domain with no restrictions on use
notes.checksums: SQLite uses SHA3-256 checksums (not SHA-256). The sha3_256 field contains these values.
notes.linux-builds: Both linux-x64 and linux-arm64 are built from source on Ubuntu 20.04 for GLIBC 2.31 compatibility. Official binaries require GLIBC 2.38+ which breaks Ubuntu 22.04 and older.
notes.tools: The tools package includes sqlite3 (CLI), sqldiff, sqlite3_analyzer, and sqlite3_rsync
notes.version-format: SQLite version 3.51.2 = 3510200 in filenames (MAJOR*1000000 + MINOR*10000 + PATCH*100)
